creator: john_sisson@insession.com
text:
If you click on the Resources link (on http://jakarta.apache.org/tomcat/tomcat-
4.0-doc/config/context.html) under the "nested components" section you get a 
page not found error.

Also should the resources link also appear on the links on the left hand side 
of the page under the title "Nested Components"?
